nodes.title: Prompting LTX-2
widgets_values:
## LTX-2 Prompting Tips
1. **Core Actions**: Describe events and actions as they occur over time  
2. **Audio**: Describe sounds and dialogue needed for the scene  
3. **Reference Image**: Do not repeat details already present  
4. **Consistency**: Avoid instructions that do not match the reference image, as this will degrade results

nodes.title: Video Size
widgets_values:
Width & height settings must be divisible by 64. 

Running with invalid parameters **will not cause errors**. Instead, the flow will silently choose the closest valid parameters.

nodes.title: (Switch between Depth, Canny, and Pose by adjusting the Select Control number.)
Model Links
widgets_values:
## Model Links

**LTX-2 Model Weights**

- [ltx-2-19b-distilled.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-2/resolve/main/ltx-2-19b-distilled.safetensors)
- [ ltx-2-spatial-upscaler-x2-1.0.safetensors ](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-2/resolve/main/ltx-2-spatial-upscaler-x2-1.0.safetensors)
- [ IC LoRA - Canny ](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-2-19b-IC-LoRA-Canny-Control/resolve/main/ltx-2-19b-ic-lora-canny-control.safetensors)
- [ IC LoRA - Depth ](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-2-19b-IC-LoRA-Depth-Control/resolve/main/ltx-2-19b-ic-lora-depth-control.safetensors)
- [ IC LoRA - Pose ](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-2-19b-IC-LoRA-Pose-Control/resolve/main/ltx-2-19b-ic-lora-pose-control.safetensors)



**Text Encoder**
- [Google Gemma 3](https://huggingface.co/google/gemma-3-12b-it-qat-q4_0-unquantized)

Please download the entire folder - 

- Run: 
 1. cd models/text_encoders
 2. git clone https://huggingface.co/google/gemma-3-12b-it-qat-q4_0-unquantized

*Full documentation can be found [here](https://docs.ltx.video/open-source-model/integration-tools/comfy-ui#text-encoder)


**Model Storage Location**

```
üìÇ ComfyUI/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÇ models/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÇ text_encoders/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ      ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ gemma-3-12b-it-qat-q4_0-unquantized/model-00001-of-00005.safetensors
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÇ checkpoints/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ      ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ltx-2-19b-distilled.safetensors
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÇ latent_upscale_models/ 
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ      ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ltx-2-spatial-upscaler-x2-1.0.safetensors
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÇ loras/ 
‚îÇ           ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ltx-2-19b-ic-lora-canny-control.safetensors
‚îÇ           ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ltx-2-19b-ic-lora-depth-control.safetensors
‚îÇ           ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ltx-2-19b-ic-lora-pose-control.safetensors
```
**Assets**
- [buildings.mp4 (input video)](https://github.com/Lightricks/ComfyUI-LTXVideo/blob/master/example_workflows/assets/buildings.mp4)
- [buildings ff (first frame)](https://github.com/Lightricks/ComfyUI-LTXVideo/blob/master/example_workflows/assets/buildings%20ff.png)

## Report Issues
To report any issues when running this workflow, [go to GitHub](https://github.com/Lightricks/ComfyUI-LTXVideo/issues)

nodes.title: Note !!
widgets_values:
##
üìù ## Width & Heigh > Width & height settings must be divisible by **64**. ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ ##
üìù ## Select Control > 1 - Depth
2 - Canny
3 - Pose
After selecting the Control number, remember to **switch to the corresponding LoRA**
*( <<< You can find the model download links in the Official Notes on the left-hand side.)* ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ ##
üìù ## Frame Count > Frame count must be divisible by **8 + 1** **Maximum**: 257 frames (~10 seconds at 25fps)
**Recommended range**: 121-161 frames for balanced quality and memory usage
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ ##
üìù **Official documents**:
[Go to Official documents](https://docs.ltx.video/open-source-model/usage-guides/image-to-video#frame-count)

nodes.title: Positive Prompt
widgets_values: Rotate left and right,A vertical pastel illustration in a soft, textured style, depicting a whimsical, steampunk-inspired assembly of pipes, wires, and urban fixtures against a plain white background. The central element is a retro, pinkish-orange 'POST' mailbox with a heart logo, integrated into a complex network of blue, green, and cream-colored pipes and electrical conduits. Above it are two square traffic lights (red and green) and a large, spherical tank. Below are various electrical boxes and switches. The entire piece is rendered with thick, visible crayon and pastel strokes, giving it a warm, dreamy, and hand-drawn quality with a gentle, diffused light.

nodes.title: RTX 5090
widgets_values:
This workflow is structured for optimized GPU and VRAM usage.

Model nodes are ordered intentionally to reduce peak VRAM load.

Input dependencies are used to organize execution order and should not be removed.

nodes.title: IC LoRA
widgets_values:
# IC LoRA Training 

For your own IC LoRA - Upload to the "IC LoRA" node.
Make sure to bypass the "IC LoRA Preprocessing" in the Samplers subgraph 

## Training
We have made available a full trainer to help you to train your own LoRA. You can [find it here](https://github.com/Lightricks/LTX-2).
